captions.introInfo: Import your file via drag and drop or alternatively use the browse dialogue.
captions.introFormats: You can import KML files (*.kml), GPX files (*.gpx) or GeoJson files (*.geojson, *.json).
captions.introDrawTool: Use the tool "$t(common:menu.tools.draw)" to change imported geometries in color and style.

alertingMessages.success: The file "{{filename}}" has been successfully imported.
alertingMessages.formatError: File "{{filename}}" could not be read. Please check if actual filetype is matching your chosen filetype.
alertingMessages.missingFileContent: There was an error loading your file "{{filename}}". Please check its filetype and content. If still not working, please contact the support.
alertingMessages.missingFormat: The chosen filetype {{format}} is not supported. Please contact the support.
alertingMessages.featureError: A feature in this file could not be read.
alertingMessages.sameName: A File with the same name "{{filename}}" is already imported, please insert another file or change the file name
